name: Event-Planner
description: A GenAI assistant that helps plan go-to-market events by generating agendas, branding, and benchmarks from minimal input.

appStages.name: Introduction
Run
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\n    \u003ch3\u003eGo To Market Event Planner\u003c/h3\u003e\n  \u003c/div\u003e\n  \u003csection\u003e\n  \u003cul\u003e\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eProvide the event details below to generate tailored planning suggestions.\u003c/li\u003e\n  \u003c/ul\u003e\n  \n  \u003c/section\u003e\n\u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Company",
              "placeholder": "eg: Google",
              "description": "Company Name",

              "tableView": true,
              "validate": {
                "required": true
              },
              "key": "company_name",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true

              "input": true
